name: 電影影像識讀
restrict: ◎限大三大四 ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習
description: 本課程主要將本人所曾開授之「電影敘述」，改為大碩合開之課程。本課程可視為第二階電影課（進/初階為通識課之「電影英文」），著重學生習得電影影像之識讀能力，學習電影文本之闡述及分析技巧。並介紹電影評論及文化相關知識，以提升閱聽者之人文素養，及影音媒體研究之熱誠。
goals: 電影及媒體教育之介紹及實踐
電影美學及影像識讀：文學設計、好萊塢主流敘事系統、視覺設計、構圖、時間設計／剪接、聲音設計、表演、及類型
電影文化研究：媒體環境理解及分析
閱聽人素質提升及倫理教育

**Course Description**

This course seeks an immersion in film education for students who are _humanities-minded_ and _really English literate_. It hopes to help students acquire a film-related vocabulary, sophisticated knowledge of film analysis, and a sharp ‘film and media sense’—cinematic, formal, media literacy. Students will read chapters from introductory or intermediate film textbooks. At the same time, the course hopes to expose students to a selected set of concepts in film and media cultural theory.

Attendance/Participation

         15% of your grade will be determined by your attendance and participation. If you cannot attend the lecture, please **do not** notify me by e-mail. Just, within 2 weeks after your absence, submit a hardcopy of an official ‘leave of absence’/請假單(with other legitimate documents, if any) to me or in my mailbox. Notification or documents of any kind will not be accepted in any electronic or virtual form. More than 5 (including 5) unexcused / undocumented absences will seriously affect your overall grade.

         Participation means active engagement with course materials. It means you come to the class **prepared,** with questions, observations, thoughts, etc. that are relevant to the course materials. It also means you respond to your classmates or me with considered comments, and make connections to other film, media or cultural issues. You should take notes during lectures and screenings.

本課程需已具備英文閱讀能力，要求按週閱讀進度，且注重觀影禮節及上課倫理，並非分享觀影印象即可過關的課程，無誠勿修。
